metadata.title: CVE-2019-16378 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OpenDMARC through 1.3.2 and 1.4.x through 1.4.0-Beta1 is prone to asignature-bypass vulnerability with multiple From: addresses, which mightaffect applications that consider a domain name to be relevant to theorigin of an e-mail message.

criterions.comment: opendmarc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
